meta.title: Type narrowing and closures
meta.short: Typescript offers a mechanism called type narrowing, which allows us to validate object's type with type guards and avoid explicit casts or error silencing. This post will give a brief demo of this feature and show it's interesting consequences.

meta.title: A static blog?
meta.short: Following the hype, I wanted to play with the new generation of static page generators. Without too much thinking I started writing this personal blog in Next.js. As I later discovered, Next has a different purpose. Let me tell you about the creation of this static blog and my adventure with Next.js.
